attributes.action: Bring people to justice who are betraying the people, on the vote for brexit
attributes.additional_details:
We want a full investigation on anyone in the government involved, who is going against the will of the people, 
These people to be banished from duty immediately, and never be allowed in any future peoples vote, or anything that involves decisions on our future, or our country, only people that honour the people's vote should be involved, this needs to be law, and for future votes, punishable in the future for anyone in our government by custodial sentence at least a month. Or more.
attributes.background:
When we go to the poling stations, this as far as i was brought up to believe, the result would be set in stone and what ever the result, this would go ahead, 
On the brexit vote the leave brexit result won,
We voted leave, 
Stick to the rules, or we will be betrayed.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
